title: Antpool Surges Past Foundry in Bitcoin Mining Race
description: Antpool took the lead from Foundry for the first time since early 2022 as the largest Bitcoin mining pool by blocks mined in November.

title: KuCoin Ventures Invests in TON Foundation: A Strategic Move for Ecosystem Growth
description: KuCoin Ventures, the investment wing of the Seychelles-registered KuCoin crypto exchange, has announced a strategic partnership with The Open Network (TON) Foundation. title: Reddit’s Official Moons Contract Renouncement Fuels Gains for MOON
description:

title: More Than $91,000,000,000 Worth of Crypto Sitting Within Binance, Bitfinex and OKX Reserves: On-Chain Data
description:
